description: WordPerfect, now known as Corel WordPerfect, was initially released in 1979 for Data General minicomputers. In 1989, WordPerfect Corporation released version 5.1 of WordPerfect for DOS . This popular version of WordPerfect includes pull-down menus, the ability to generate print previews, and the ability to embed tables in documents.
By default, WordPerfect 5.x saves users' documents as WP5 files. WordPerfect 5.1+ can also save documents in the WP6 format.
